contact.summary:
Derek is the founder of N2 Technology Ltd, a platform designed to connect start-up opportunities with investors. This venture is a manifestation of Derek's 30+ years of experience and expertise in private markets and start-up ecosystems.

Derek co-founded and served as the CEO of Wake Asset Management, a Geneva, Switzerland-based hedge fund manager that oversaw more than $500m in assets with a gross market exposure of $3.5b.

Under his leadership, Wake Asset Management acted as the manager for Wake Alternative Investments, a segregated portfolio company located in the Caymans. Within this structure, Derek operated a multi-disciplined alternative management platform, managing a variety of strategies as a portfolio manager. These included convertible arbitrage, long-short equity, distressed, credit, statistical arbitrage, and venture capital. 
Crucial to the firm's success was the development and implementation of advanced technologies for effective data collection, cleaning, and modelling. This infrastructure supported enhanced risk management and facilitated algorithmic trading. Profitability optimization included strategically managing funds across prime brokerage agreements with major financial institutions, including Goldman Sachs, Credit Suisse, and Merrill Lynch, as well as discretionary accounts with Julius Baer. This movement was crucial to risk management and profitability optimization

From Wake Asset Management, he launched Wake2o and Wake-x, providing advisory services to private markets and creating an online secondary marketplace for illiquid private market assets.

Before his leadership at Wake, Derek was a Senior Portfolio Manager for the Decillion Convertible Arbitrage Fund. His career in finance began at Salomon Brothers, where he spent 9 years in the Japanese warrants & convertibles proprietary arbitrage group, stationed in London, Zurich, and Tokyo.

Beyond his professional accomplishments, Derek is a father of three who enjoys mountain climbing and alpinism.

contact.summary:
I’m extremely good at one thing. And that’s helping software and tech companies to rank for their target keywords.

Results

➡️ I was part of a team of content marketers that helped Aura (a digital security company) increase organic traffic by 90% over a period of six months.

➡️I Created and executed a content marketing strategy to help Aurelius (user research platform) double organic traffic in 8months

➡️ Helped Guru (HR tech company) increase organic growth to the template section of the website by 585% 

➡️ Helped GoLinks (a link management platform) to rank for over 1,200 keywords within a year through topic clusters and long-form content writing

And more...

My Approach

The first lesson I learned in SEO is that “not all traffic is created equally”. 

Traffic is not the goal. Driving bucket loads of sales that generate ROI - that’s the goal.

You want targeted traffic from a qualified audience most likely to buy your offer or take your call to action. 

Here's how I can help you increase ROI with content-led SEO

✅ Become obsessed with your ideal user by using audience insight to understand the problems they face, what they want in a solution and how we can position the brand as a trusted source

✅ OWN topics, not just keywords, to build authority in your niche and beyond

✅ Build a blog that balances quantity and quality to become the leading source of truth in your industry

✅  Diversify content formats with webinars, educational YouTube videos, expert insights, podcasts and other multi-media formats

✅  Manage a team of writers
I've managed writers while working agency side and on behalf of clients when executing content strategies. 

✅ Use data from GA, GSC and SEO Tools to improve results

On the side:
I’ve published on Hackernoon, Semrush, and Search Engine Watch. I’ve been featured on HubSpot, Entrepreneur, Search Engine Journal and Search Engine Land
I've spoken at BrightonSEO, Women In Tech SEO Festival and will soon be speaking at LondonSEOXl and Nottingham Digital

I’ve driven results for small businesses that needed help competing and for top brands on the edge of glory.

When I'm not working on content, I use my spare time to:
- Browse TV shows on Amazon Prime that I never watch
- Work on projects to uplift BIPOC marketers through the Freelance Coalition for Developing Countries
- Read fiction by African authors

Ready to hire me for your content marketing role?

Drop a message 
chima@zenithcopy.com

contact.summary:
There are a few things neither a portfolio nor a C.V. address that may be helpful to know. For example, my earliest memory is of driving down the highway with my father. He asked me to look at a McDonald’s sign – the quintessential golden arches. He then handed me a crayon and asked me to draw what I thought the gear inside the sign (that made it spin) looked like. I was three years old.

Fast forward to how it played out: Professionally trained graphic designer and design strategist. Learned the ropes at Pentagram and Michael Osborne Design. Moved client side leading design teams to develop product, packaging, merchandising and retail experiences for Nordstrom. Journeyed into finance at BofA and Wells Fargo where real estate development and service design quickly became passions as I learned the mortgage benefits of employment in financial services. Completed the Leading By Design Fellows Program to secure a deep expertise in design and user research, user-centered design, UX strategy, and innovation acceleration. Which brings us to today, consulting for wonderfully diverse clients and teaching design and user research to people around the world.

I do my best work when I’m exploring new and disparate ideas, designing across disciplines, and helping others to do the same. I am a strong advocate and practitioner of human-centered and socially responsible design. Entrepreneurial in spirit, and collaborative by nature, I have an equally creative and analytical mind and a passion for tackling complex challenges that lead to positive change. I'm recognized as a fearless, jolly, and curious entrepreneur and a leader of design, research,  and business-led solutions.

What I do isn’t a job to me, per se. Rather, it’s a fundamental part of who I am and how I live my life. My journey is to explore and enjoy life in many facets, to set an example for my growing family, and to help build and contribute to my personal and professional communities. I will forever be a student of life. Design thinking is in my DNA.

profile_positions.description:
Curiosity Tank is a consulting and education firm specializing in human-centered research, design development, and hands-on learning programs. We conduct and teach design and user research to people and corporations around the world. 

Our solutions are affordable and repeatable. We apply our diverse research methods and traditional graphic design roots to deliver formidable results across all platforms, media, and markets. 

Our consulting and training services cater to individuals and teams in the following areas: 
> Design thinking and innovation workshop design and facilitation
> Qualitative research
> Systems thinking
> UX/interaction
> Prototyping  
> Team, product and service design creation and evolution 
> UX, product and education strategy 
> Curricula development and execution 
Let us deliver something remarkable for you. Or better yet, let us help you do it yourself.

Curiosity Tank is led by Michele Ronsen, a professional user researcher, designer, coach, and educator with more than 5,000 hours of adult design and user research teaching expertise in academic institutions and 20+ years of corporate training, workshops, design and research for Fortune 500s and start-ups.

We love questions!
> Learn more about us: www.CuriosityTank.com
> Workshops for individuals: www.CuriosityTank.com/workshops
> Corporate training: www.curiositytank.com/corporate-workshops
> Speaking engagements and other questions: hello@curiositytank.com
	
Clients include Slack, Zillow, Invisalign, Xero, Microsoft, MileIQ, Autodesk, Square, Facebook, Kaiser Permanente, BNP Paribas, Best Buy, Blue Shield, PayPal, Mapfre, California College of the Arts, UC Berkeley, and many fantastic startups and mom and pop shops.

Responsible for $4 MM yearly operating budget in addition to all project expenses, freelance and support agency con-tracts.

Brand-Driven Innovation: Created the company’s first Internal Brand Standards, a complex 100-page document de-signed to promote consistent execution, and enterprise-wide adoption as well as to articulate and demonstrate the Wells Fargo employee value proposition in action.

contact.summary:
▶︎ 𝗠𝗬 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗦𝗘: We Help Performing Professionals regain their confidence through torching 🔥 body fat, building more muscle 💪🏾 and increasing mental energy.

This is done through ELITE level principles developed through my years at Premier League Football club, Crystal Palace FC and competing for 4 years playing NCAA D1 Soccer at GSU.

I’ve been in your position myself, a couple of times

1st, when I graduated from Georgia State Men’s Soccer & was thrust into the real world with no more sport & no time to workout

2nd, when I started working in the corporate world & had no time to prepare healthy meals like I did when I was a full-time athlete. 

(long story short, I gained a fair amount of weight & did NOT like what I saw in the mirror)

After a couple of hard years I worked out how to find the right system that allowed me to work a job, & still have a six-pack & look exactly how I looked as an athlete! 

In short, I am telling you that there is a better way than just copying youtube workouts, or trying to remember old workouts you did when you were in shape
You don’t need keto, paleo, or Atkins, & you don’t need to spend hours in the gym

IF you are someone who used to be in great shape, & you are:

❌ Tired of copying old workouts you did as an athlete (or when you were in great shape)

❌ Sick & tired of trying to stick to a tough diet with no results

❌ Looking for a more sustainable way to lose body fat, build life-changing muscle & transform your confidence – even with a busy job & family 

I’ve got something that’ll put an end to your misery, once & for all

It’s called the “Optimised Athlete”

Finally, you will:

✅ Never have to worry about what you eat because you have finally found a sustainable solution that doesn’t involve starving yourself 

✅ Become a better leader, have more energy, & have a body that represents someone who is strong & proud 

✅ Improve your personal relationships due to being more confident, building more muscle & changing your mindset towards exercise & health 

If you don't believe me - checkout what my clients have said:

“I’ve been working with Javen for the last 6 months & he is truly amazing! He has put me in the best physical shape I’ve been in since ending my D1 soccer career. ” – Maya Boles
contact.reactor_title: CEO & Founder Of SPECTRUMFIT | Over 100 Lives Changed through the Optimised Athlete Program | Maximising Health Through Better Sleep, Optimal Cognitive Function, and Body Recomposition - Free Health Guide BELOW👇🏾

profile_positions.description:
▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝘼𝙏 𝙄 𝘿𝙊: I help office-based workers drop 10-15lbs of body fat, transform their energy and build muscle using my elite-level health and fitness building principles developed through 10 years of elite experience at Premier League Football Club Crystal Palace FC & 4 years as a NCAA D1 Soccer Player @ Georgia State. 

▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝙔 𝙐𝙎𝙀 𝙈𝙀?
 • SAVE TIME - Avoid continuing to make mistakes and "trying" on your own...that just doesn't work. You wouldn't try to remove your own wisdom tooth, no - instead you hire a professional. Your health and fitness should be held in the same regard. You are already busy - so how will you find the time to research the latest training strategies and latest studies on nutrition? 

• SAVE MONEY - Stop wasting money on youtube workouts, unused gym membership and generic programs 

• ELITE COACHING - Very few coaches have my high level of training experience. Work with someone who has been at the highest level

▶︎ 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗨𝗧𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗘𝗦: Our clients are asked to commit and implement in a seamless manner that doesn't take over their lives... We see:
• 15-20lbs weight loss in 3-4 months - which results in higher energy, better sleep and more body confidence

• 15-20% increase in strength and muscle - many of our clients improve the weight they lift on all major lifts such as bench press, squats and deadlifts. This results in better metabolic health and regulation of blood sugar levels

• Better sleep and energy levels - once the strength and fitness begin to increase, other areas of our clients lives seem to take an upturn 

• More productive and efficient with time - this sees clients become higher performers at work and in business. Closing more sales, being more efficient and overall happier! 

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐨𝐮𝐜𝐡? 𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐅𝐑𝐄𝐄 𝟏-𝟐-𝟏 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐭 𝐁𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐰
profile_positions.title: Online Fitness Coach | Corporate Health & Wellness Coach | Former Athlete

profile_positions.description:
▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝘼𝙏 𝙄 𝘿𝙊: We help Small & Medium Sized businesses deliver a WELL crafted Health and Wellness program. Not just a discounted membership or incentive-based point system. Healthcare is employers' 2nd or 3rd biggest expense - the majority caused by poor metabolic health; through implementing actionable and personal health and fitness programs we can decrease absenteeism and improve worker productivity by 15-20%. 

▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝙔 𝙐𝙎𝙀 𝙈𝙀? 

• SAVE TIME - Avoid poor corporate wellness programs that don't actually help the individual needs of your employees

• SAVE MONEY - Obesity can cost employees $3500 in additional expenses...just a reduction in 10-15% of body weight can help reduce these effects and save your company money  

• HEALTHIER WORKPLACE - Dropping 10-15% of body weight can reverse prediabetes, it can help manage blood pressure and increase your overall metabolic health, preventing the effect of viruses and diseases.

▶︎ 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗨𝗧𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗘𝗦: Our clients are asked to commit and implement in a seamless manner that doesn't take over their lives...We see:
• 15-20lbs weight loss in 3-4 months - which results in higher energy, better sleep and more body confidence

• 15-20% increase in company revenue - this is due to an improvement in employee productivity and efficiency. Office-based workers need energy, and mental focus in order to improve their ability to drive the company forward, we provide that

• 15-20% increase in strength and muscle - many of our clients improve the weight they lift on all major lifts such as bench press, squats and deadlifts. This results in better metabolic health and regulation of blood sugar levels

• Better sleep and energy levels - once the strength and fitness begin to increase, other areas of our client's lives seem to take an upturn 

• More productive and efficient with time - this sees clients become higher performers at work and in business. Closing more sales, being more efficient and overall happier!
profile_positions.title: Corporate Wellness Coach

profile_positions.description:
▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝘼𝙏 𝙄 𝘿𝙊: Delivering life-changing webinars, seminars and workshops for Small and Medium-sized businesses. These are centred around health, fitness and simple training principles that can be easily implemented with a full-time job and having a family.

▶︎ 𝙆𝙚𝙮 𝘼𝙧𝙚𝙖: 𝙂𝙧𝙤𝙪𝙥 𝙝𝙚𝙖𝙡𝙩𝙝 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙛𝙞𝙩𝙣𝙚𝙨𝙨 𝙚𝙙𝙪𝙘𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣: I am a health and fitness expert with over 10 years in elite level sports, I deliver wellness talks to help employees improve their health in a quick and easy manner without giving up their entire lives - this has enormous impact on businesses

▶︎ 𝙆𝙚𝙮 𝘼𝙧𝙚𝙖: 𝙃𝙖𝙥𝙥𝙞𝙚𝙧 𝙒𝙤𝙧𝙠𝙥𝙡𝙖𝙘𝙚: All the data tells us that exercise can decrease stress, decrease risk of health issues and more - by implementing my 1-2-1 hands-on coaching methods, employees will be higher energy and more efficient in the workplace 

▶︎ 𝙆𝙚𝙮 𝘼𝙧𝙚𝙖: 𝙀𝙢𝙥𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙚𝙚 𝙀𝙣𝙜𝙖𝙜𝙚𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩 An engaged workforce can boost revenue by millions. I work using a 3 step strategy centered around Accountability, Fitness, & Nutrition.

▶︎ 𝙃𝙀𝙍𝙀'𝙎 𝙃𝙊𝙒 𝙄 𝘿𝙊 𝙄𝙏: Group assessments and inverviews to see what is the most common issue employees face. A highly live and interactive engagement process to help employees understand and implement my trainings. We create high performing, high functioning individuals. 

▶︎ 𝙏𝙃𝙀 𝙍𝙀𝙎𝙐𝙇𝙏𝙎 Better communication, more influence, better staff engagement, less turnover, & more revenue. 

▶︎ 𝙒𝙃𝙊 𝙄𝙎 𝙏𝙃𝙄𝙎 𝙁𝙊𝙍? CEOs, EVPs, VPs, Directors (with ambition), and HR Teams who want to supercharge results and lead others authentically and with purpose. My clients are tired of overwhelm - they want to 𝙙𝙤 𝙝𝙞𝙜𝙝 𝙡𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙡 𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙠 𝙬𝙝𝙞𝙡𝙚 𝙢𝙖𝙞𝙣𝙩𝙖𝙞𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙗𝙖𝙡𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙚 in their life.

I will give you an exact strategy to implement with or without me

▶︎ 𝐄𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞-𝐁𝐚𝐬𝐞𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐚𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠 & 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐬: All my strategies are EXACTLY what I have used on all my top clients, helping add revenue to companies and improve individuals through better nutrition, lifestyle choices and training principles. contact.title: Copywriter & Email Marketer
contact.name: Ashita Verma
contact.summary:
Copywriter, Marketer by day…. Content creator by night.

Hey, I’m Ashita, a freelance business owner helping you grow your brand through varied marketing channels organically and through paid media.

Or just like my dad says, “She does something that makes you more credible and visible on the INTERNET”.

From social media to content, to lead-gen and editorial- I’ve done it all. 

Worked with Clients like the CDC (U.S. govt), QueueBuster, Scientific Nutrition, Erickson India.


𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗜 𝗗𝗢: I help healthcare, SaaS brands, Coaches and Founders achieve the online presence they desire by providing end-to-end marketing and copywriting solutions.

𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘𝗦 𝗠𝗘 𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗤𝗨𝗘: lies in my experience of working with various businesses across the 8+ countries, both big and small. Over time, I have honed my skills to develop customized digital solutions tailored to the specific needs of each business and industry and their goals. This approach allows me to create personalized solutions that truly align with their business needs.

𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗜𝗖𝗘𝗦 𝗜 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗘:
✔️LinkedIn Marketing 
✔️Sales Funnel Building 
✔️Email Marketing 
✔️End-to-end Copywriting 
✔️Fb, Insta Ads
✔️Website Copywriting 
✔️Marketing Strategy 

Brand voice plays a crucial role in marketing and keeping your brand voice intact is my responsibility. 

I keep this in check by hopping on a Branding call with you. Discuss about your USP, your ideal customer Avatar, their pain points, solutions for them and a lot more!

Still a startup? Don't have a USP statement or a unique brand voice? I can help you with it! We can discuss and give your brand a unique brand voice depending on your ideal customer Avatar, fav brands, brand colours  and your goals. 

Just like the tea requires the right amount of sugar, your brand requires Ashita to give the right punch to your copy.

Message me “GROWTH” and let’s get the ball rolling!

Or send a mail at ashita@growthfuelmarketing.com

projects.description:
The project "Growing autoRetouch" achieved impressive results in just four months, increasing its organic monthly visitors from 4182 to 5400. The project focused on building an AI-Powered Image Editing blog and ranking highly on Google for lucrative keywords in the photo editing industry.

The key steps involved in the project were as follows:

Choosing the Right Topic: The project emphasized selecting a topic that could attract a large audience and satisfy three requirements: diverse themes, topics with high search volume, and moderate competition.

Selecting Suitable Keywords: The project used keyword research tools to identify keywords with sufficient search volume and low difficulty for targeting.

Wiki-Based Tactics: The project employed the wiki strategy to brainstorm ideas and generate relevant sub-topics for content creation.

"Also Rank For" Strategy: By exploring related keywords of chosen topics, the project expanded its list of potential keywords for targeting.

Competitive Intelligence Mining: The project analyzed competitors' websites to understand their top-performing keywords and topics.

Creating Rankable Content: The project focused on producing high-quality content that outperformed the competition in terms of detail, relevance, and readability.

Promoting Content: The project utilized LinkedIn and Facebook for targeted advertising, and backlink strategies like Web2.0, guest posts, and forum backlinks for link building.

Emphasizing Patience: The project highlighted the importance of patience in SEO, as it takes time to see significant results, and high-quality content will continue to drive traffic in the long term.

Overall, "Growing autoRetouch" successfully implemented SEO strategies to rapidly grow its blog's traffic and establish a strong online presence in the photo editing industry.

Are you a young ambitious professional with dreams beyond the horizon? 

Striving to break free from your comfort zone and redefine what's possible?

Together, we'll embark on a transformational journey that empowers you to become the architect of your success story.

From Self-Doubt to Self-Mastery:

• Ignite Your Inner Power
• Boost Self-Confidence
• Conquer Doubt
• Defeat Procrastination
• Overcome Imposter Syndrome
• Master Time Management
• Speak with Impact
• Embrace Fear
• Amplify Productivity
• Elevate Performance
• Pursue Relentless Growth

𝗘𝗺𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 = 𝗨𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝗲 𝗣𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹:

• Embodying Courage
• Navigating Challenges
• Achieving Fearless Goals
• Becoming Resilient

Join me in the pursuit of greatness and personal mastery.

Here's how you can start:

• 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗮 𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗡𝗼𝘄 (𝘁𝗶𝗱𝘆𝗰𝗮𝗹.𝗰𝗼𝗺/𝗺𝗶𝗸𝗲𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗲𝘀/𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲)

• 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝗠𝘆 𝗪𝗲𝗯𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲 (𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗲𝘀𝗺𝗶𝗸𝗲.𝗰𝗼𝗺)

• 𝗗𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱 𝗠𝘆 𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗧𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆 (𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗲𝘀𝗺𝗶𝗸𝗲.𝗰𝗼𝗺/𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘆𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸)

• 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗔𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀, 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗲𝘀 & 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 (𝗵𝘁𝘁𝗽𝘀://𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝘀.𝗴𝗹𝗲/𝗶𝗴𝗭𝘇𝗣𝟰𝟭𝗝𝗙𝟱𝗿𝗬𝗴𝗯𝗿𝗔𝟲)

Here's to Your Personal Growth. 🔥
Mike Younes.
Personal Growth.

profile_positions.description:
• 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗢𝗻𝗲-𝗼𝗻-𝗢𝗻𝗲.
• 𝗚𝗿𝗲𝘄 𝗮 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗼𝗳 𝟭𝟴,𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗽𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗻 organically in 1 year ('23).
• 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝟭,𝟬𝟬𝟬,𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 organically in 1 year ('23). 
• 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝘁 𝗮 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱.
• 𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 daily and consistently on the 𝘁𝗼𝗽𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗟𝗶𝗳𝗲/𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀/𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵.

• Gained writing, networking & marketing skills.
• Built real relationships that started on LinkedIn.
profile_positions.title: Personal Growth. (Personal Development, Coaching)

profile_positions.description:
• 𝗟𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗸 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗴𝗵 𝗮 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗚𝗼-𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝗹𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸 in the Middle East ('22).
• 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝟱𝟬+ 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗮𝗳𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗚𝗼-𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 on the front office, risk and back office streams ('22).
• 𝗦𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝗲𝗱𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗳𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗴𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝟮 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸𝘀 in the Middle East ('21).
• 𝗗𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝟯𝟬+ 𝗖𝗥𝘀 to improve a client's MX.3 business as part of the front office team ('20-'21).
• 𝗗𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝟮𝟬+ 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴𝘀 internally and externally on interest rate derivatives, commodities, forex derivatives and MX.3 Front Office modules.
• Gained in-depth knowledge of the capital markets, money markets, forex markets, fixed income markets, stock markets, commodity markets industries and products.
• Gained a good understanding of the credit risk and xVA/PFE module.
• Gained a good understanding of the End-of-Day process.
profile_positions.title: MX.3 Front Office & Risk Functional Consultant (Capital Markets, FinTech)

contact.summary:
I believe that to build an authentic community at your company, you need to bring together your team to learn, meet and grow with your leaders and with each other.  

Every month since 2014, I’ve hosted events for more than 50,000 members of TechTO, Canada’s largest tech community.  Not only did we spotlight tech leaders to share lessons learned, but we dedicated half the time of every event to our community members meeting each other and making their own announcements too. 

And as the community grew, it got harder to execute. Not just from a philosophical perspective (how do we make this a good use of people's time?), but from a logistics one too. Like, how do we quickly make a microphone accessible to 1,000 people in a theatre? (Our solution: I ride a hoverboard around the audience with a wireless mic and give everyone 10 seconds to address the entire audience. It’s fun :) 

When the pandemic hit, I knew it was more important than ever to keep our community together. And if we couldn’t do it physically, we’d have to do it remotely. On March 19th 2020, we committed to hosting an interactive livestream every weekday for the rest of the year. (We ended up doing 115 weekdays in a row, and 140 total streams in the year). 

This was when I learned about a very real challenge: There wasn’t an engaging way for our members to participate in these large remote virtual events. And if I was experiencing this with our members, how were companies working remotely going to create company culture remotely? 

That’s why I started Venue.

Traditional video conferencing platforms like Zoom, Meet, and Teams are built for small meetings, not big moments. Virtual event software like Hopin, Cvent, and Swoogo are more like webinars for sponsors than inclusive, culture-building experiences. Venue is the platform that we’ve carefully crafted for big meetings and presentations with an audience that you deeply care about engaging. 

We’re doing this by bringing interactive tools from social channels like Twitch, Instagram, and Discord to your company’s Town Halls, AMAs and much more. Not only do we provide the platform, but we can also provide support to help you produce and execute these engaging virtual events.

If you’re curious to learn more about the work we’re doing at Venue and how you can create more engaging large company-wide events, then let’s connect and chat. 

My inbox is always open :)

Lead operational excellence initiatives and new product/market initiatives across the organization to continue APFM’s rapid growth.

A Place for Mom (APFM) is the nation’s largest senior living referral service, helping over 1 million families find senior care and housing each year using technology and local sales advisors. In 2010, APFM was acquired by Warburg Pincus, a $40 billion private equity company. A new executive team joined in 2011 to lead the transformation of APFM from founder-run business to an online healthcare market leader. The company has since soared, and it is now experiencing 50%+ YoY growth and enjoying a dominant and defensible position in the internet technology sector for finding senior housing and care.

With over 23 years of experience as an employee and as a consultant, as well as a long career as an artist and designer, I have worked in different industries like automotive, health care or IT. I support leaders, teams and organizations to develop the skills and apply the tools to make change happen through neuroscience.

Maria Luisa Engels is part of a global network of corporate consultants trained by Dr. Joe Dispenza, New York Times best-selling author, lecturer, and researcher, to teach organizations how to apply the neuroscience of change to increase employee engagement, collaboration, creativity, productivity, and ultimately — business results. The kind that can enable organizations to create new outstanding results.
She has been involved in Dr. Joe Dispenza’s work since 2016.

NCS consultants have worked with teams at Cisco, Sony, Coca-Cola, IBM, Johnson & Johnson, USAID, Rackspace, Microsoft, Pfizer, Heineken, and many more.
Organizations who benefit from working with NCS believe that…

•	Day-to-day stress is “death by 1000 cuts” for performance and productivity and know there has to be a better way to work together to meet project deadlines and performance goals.
•	Thriving during mass-scale change or reaching higher levels in business as usual times can only happen from the inside out.
•	Individual employee habits add up to and dictate how well a company performs.
•	The best way to create an organization nimble enough to act and thrive on market changes is to intentionally focus on upgrading the individual patterns of each employee.

To learn more about NCS offerings, message me here on LinkedIn or by email at 
MarisaE@NeuroChangeSolutions.com

Contact me for a 15-minute call to discuss the challenges your organization is facing and the optimum outcome you’d like to see.
If you’re interested in learning more, I will develop a proposal to highlight how NCS can support your needs and meet your specific goals in your change efforts.

We're a digital marketing agency with a passion for building your company’s brand via ORGANIC video content (so no more ads that don't work, yet still cost you an arm and a leg...) 

Specialising in TikTok, Instagram and YouTube, we have helped our clients dominate their niche; scaling from 0-100k followers in less than 4 months!

How do we do it?

- Individually designed strategy 
- Optimised profile
- Community building 
- Memorable brand identity 

Think we could take you or your brand to the next level?

Drop me a DM or check out the links on my profile!

contact.summary:
▪️My Mission is to build a full stack global startup ecosystem right from Incubation to funding connecting across India, UK, UAE & Israel.

▪️I am a second generation Entrepreneur & Investor aged 26 at Rachit Group headquartered in Surat predominantly into the textiles industry since 1992. We are one of the market leaders in manufacturing wide range of textile fabrics and designer ethnic wear for women, serving to premium retailers and wholesalers across PAN India and 10+ countries to the likes of Manyavar.

▪️I am Co-Founder at IVY Growth Associates alongside Praatek, Mehul, Sharad. We’re a sector agnostic Angel Network & MicroVC having 30+ Shareholders and 300+ Angel Investors with over 55+ Investments incl. Zypp, Blusmart etc.

▪️ I am Co-Founder at Funding Possibilities Dubai alongside 6+ CXO’s. We’re creating a Fintech platform to facilitate Equity, Debt and M&A deals. 

▪️I am Partner at JB Ventures, leading conglomerate’s micro fund having 10+ Investments with notable names like We Founder Circle - EvolveX, Escrowpay etc.

▪️I am Partner at Nine Spar Partners, a micro fund having over 20+ Professionals/CXO’s with 30+ Investments to the likes of ReshaMandi, Vedantu etc.

▪️Our family office has invested in 20+ companies with notable names like 9Unicorns, Sapio Analytics etc, making a group collective total of 100+ Investments and 5M$ AUM.

▪️We, at IVY hosted one of India’s largest startup annual summit in Surat by the name 21 by 72 with over 8000+ footfall spanning across 3 days. We have also hosted micro events in Mumbai, Dubai, London etc. 

▪️I have been recognised by Times 40U40 Surat award, Entrepreneurs Today 30U30, Indian Achievers Award 2021.

▪️I have been featured in YourStory, BusinessWorld, BWDisrupt, BusinessStandard, ETTech, VCCircle, TOI.

▪️I have pursued my bachelors and masters degree from University of Wolverhampton in BA(Hons.) Business management at Mumbai campus & University of Westminster, London in M.Sc Entrepreneurship, Innovation & Enterprise Development respectively. Further, I have also accomplished an ExecEd Alumni status from London Business School in Corporate Finance.

▪️My prestigious certifications include Oxford Summer course, SPJIMR, IIM-A, HBS Online etc.

▪️I am a member at esteemed global organisations like Corporate Connections, Della Leaders Club, TiE, Institute of Directors London.

▪️I am a traveller by passion with visits to over 29 countries and 100 cities and achievements of sky dive and scuba dive.

▪️Reach out to me for Fundraising, Business Modelling, Global Investment Opportunities, & Networking.

contact.summary:
Building a successful brand online is no small feat. In today's competitive landscape, standing out and conveying your vision can be a daunting task. 

You're in the right place for a tailored solution that addresses your unique challenges.

My name is Nelson I. Nworie, I'm a Blockchain Content Marketer, Content Writer, and LinkedIn Strategist driven by a passion for driving businesses and individuals toward their aspirations. My track record speaks for itself, consistently delivering exceptional results.

I help businesses harness the power of blockchain technology to build thriving businesses. I also empower individuals to grasp the potential use cases of blockchain and build successful careers in this disruptive technology.

My role as a Content Marketer is to not just tell stories, but to inspire and engage your audiences, ensuring your unique selling points resonate with the intended market.

As a LinkedIn Strategist, I partner with businesses and individuals to construct distinctive brands. Through storytelling and solution-driven content, I pave the way for unparalleled opportunities.

Beyond results, my uniqueness lies in understanding your individual hurdles and tailoring my services accordingly. My approach is flexible, collaborative, and practical.

Let's have a conversation today to start building a compelling online presence .

✍ Writing and editing blog posts, social media updates, email newsletters, and other content pieces that engage and inform the target audience.

contact.summary:
WHAT WE DO: We help all-size businesses reduce the overload, frenzy, and meeting mania of everyday work so that they can reclaim the critical thinking time and employee vitality they need to succeed. We deliver these changes through flexible and customizable training, consulting, and live event modalities. 

WHY CLIENTS CALL US: When talented teams are drowning in meetings and inundated by the pings, dings, and messages that clutter their minds, there is no way for them to be strategic, creative, and engaged. In addition, working amid these distractions and in a state of constant hallucinated urgency leads to mental health problems, burnout, and a degraded employee experience. Our clients are the future-thinking leaders who want to change this paradigm and are READY to do something about it. They hire us to do the following: 

* Support mental health and reduce burnout.
* Reduce wasteful work, email, slack, and meetings.
* Optimize and organize team communication
* Ease pace, pressure, and unnecessary urgency.
* Make better use of existing headcount.
* Allow more time for creativity, strategy, and thoughtfulness.

We release the potential of your most valuable resource—your people.

COMPANIES THAT TRUST US: Salesforce, Spotify, National Geographic, Anthem, Vans, Abbott, Costco, Pepsi, Nike, Wells Fargo, Sephora, Sysco, and ESPN, as well as many small to midsize businesses just like you.

WHAT OUR LEARNERS SAY:
“This has been the most useful training that I’ve had in twenty-plus years of being in the industry.”
“I’ve had significant time received back to my schedule.”
“When I am in the company of others now, I am present with them.”
“The course has created a common language on my team and among my colleagues that we all now speak. THANK YOU for this initiative.”
“This was the first time in my entire seventeen-year career that I felt it was safe to disconnect from work during the holidays.”
“It’s given me more time to focus on high-value items and the ability to say no graciously.”
“This course has transformed my approach to repetitive/recurring tasks.”

Watch a client video testimonial here: https://www.julietfunt.com/jfg/.

If you’re ready to 
~ defeat busywork; 
~ achieve top-level priorities faster;
~ make work simple, pleasant, and effective;
~ save your company millions of dollars of talent time; and
~ create a positive culture to make your workplace more pleasant and attractive to top talent . . .

READY TO CHAT?: Reach out to me directly here on LinkedIn or visit me online at julietfunt.com or email juliet@julietfunt.com.

profile_positions.description:
“This isn’t what they hired me for…” is the defeated refrain of the stressed-out professional, overheard in workplaces drowning in busywork across the globe. And once busywork gets a foothold in your organization it’s a creeping weed - slowly strangling profitability, efficiency, and morale.

Juliet Funt Group is on a mission to defeat busywork. We help teams execute better, increase their productivity, and find more meaning in their work. We provide mindset shifts through easily scalable training components of streamed, digital, and self-facilitated teaching elements.

After working with us, your teams work more productively, waste is reduced, and your people feel happier and empowered to focus on the work that matters. This shifts the culture to one of balance, performance, and creativity - freed of the deadweight of busywork which, in turn, can put you on the path to be an employer of choice. If you’re ready for that monumental shift, I invite you to start a conversation about how we can best serve you.

profile_positions.description:
Commercial Head for the largest BU - Decorative Paints of the 14,000+ Cr. company with an annual outlay of Rs.1000 Cr+ for Marketing, Retailing, Services & Business Innovation verticals | Project Lead for initiating and driving Cost & Process Excellence. 

- Supporting the Executive Leadership by proactively addressing business challenges, designing new operating models and financial strategies for revenue enablement and improved opportunities. 
- Managing a team of 3 Managers, 5 Executives, 29 Officers and 8 Outsourced Employees.
- Holds the credit for restructuring the operational infrastructure, formulated plans for business growth, evaluated the success of various projects / programmes or various innovative initiatives in boosting business profitability.
- Restructured the Logistics and Distribution Infrastructure related to FG import of Rs.200 crores per year including express delivery for wallpapers. It significantly reduced the overall cost and delivery time at customer point.
- Instrumental in establishing a Greenfield Integrated Marketing Warehouse of 90000 sq. ft., first of its kind in the industry; digitized the distribution of 2500+ SKU of marketing collaterals, achieved savings of Rs 10 cr per year.
- Created a large ecosystem of 800+ marketing vendors to deliver goods and services throughout India with optimum cost and service assurance; achieved savings of Rs 20 Cr per year through this centralization process.
- Launched “Channel Financing Program” for Asian Paints Dealers with Indusind Bank, first in Paints Industry.
- Steering End to End Life Cycle Management of 2500+ Outsourced Manpower spread across the country.
- Statutory Compliance for all 32 establishments across the country; seamless transition of GST for 800 vendors.
- Pivotal in establishing a new line of business covering key implements (Tools, Brushes) of paints industry.
- Achieved Annual budgetary plans for 3 consecutive years through systemic review and control mechanism.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Head- Marketing,Services and Businesss Innovation

profile_positions.description:
Led the Commercial and Administrative functions for the Country; spearheaded All India Depot Operations with total 110 depots and Annual Sales Value of more than Rs.12000 Cr.; ensured last mile delivery to a large set of over 40000 dealers within the stipulated delivery time and stringent service deliverables consistently.

- Successfully implemented 5 year Infra roadmap for depots and managed 55 million sqft warehouse space.
- Ensuring smooth & robust operations linked with Distribution, Warehousing and CFA Management all across India.
- Accounting, Validation and Control of all Trade Discounts, Schemes, Gifts / Business Promotions for channel.
- Provided vision & leadership to a large in-house team of 200+ employees (8 Managers, 18 Executives, 200+ Officers) and 3000+ CFA outsourced Manpower, established systems & processes; excelled in delivering outcomes. 
- Efficiently managed Budgeting, review and cost controls of Sales commercial overheads of more than Rs 800 Cr.
- Drove cost optimization programs for operational/Financial efficiencies and driven savings of more than 15 crores.
- Launched “Samanvay” a highly successful program to connect with all 70 Professional CFA’s across the country.
- Instigated WMS (Warehouse Management System) and OTM (Oracle Transport Management) all throughout. 
- Established new industry benchmarks by strengthening the commercial framework and achieving cost efficiencies along with excellence in delivery operations. 
- Drove operational excellence initiatives and was successful in introducing reforms in the commercial processes by building collaborative synergies, effective budgeting and cost control initiatives.

contact.summary:
As a Content Maestro, I'm all about turbocharging clients' brand game on LinkedIn – that digital marketing juggernaut that separates the lions from the lambs. Check this out: I've personally rocketed my follower count to a mind-bending 10,000+ in a mere blink of 5 months. Yep, you read that right – not years, but months!

But hey, that's just the warm-up. I've orchestrated a mind-blowing online course that had a stampede of 500+ students knocking down the virtual doors. Ka-ching – that's the sound of success rolling in, baby!

Content? Man, I live and breathe it. Whether it's crafting killer copy, whipping up eye-popping carousels, dishing out graphics that practically high-five your retinas, or weaving video edits that leave you hitting that replay button like it owes you money – I do it all. And guess what? I've got a top-tier crew of design champs who're basically artists on steroids, churning out jaw-dropping content that steals the spotlight.

When it comes to the digital jungle, I'm Tarzan swinging on the vines of growth and monetization. I've got the map to this online treasure hunt, and let me tell you, "X" marks the spot where dreams transform into reality. I've got this ninja-like knack for turning content strategies into gold mines, making sure every piece of content is distributed with the precision of a heat-seeking missile, all while keeping that consistency dialled up to eleven. Yeah, your goals just found themselves an express lane to achievement town.

You've got goals? You've got dreams? Well, partner up with me and consider them LIT. Don't be shy – reach out, and let's turn those dreams into the kind of success story they make movies about. 

I'm not just a content enthusiast – I'm your genie, here to make those dreams come true!

As a Visual Agile Coach I help people and organizations leverage the power of visuals for improved communication, engagement and delivery of value.

I established and maintained trade contacts, headed up the Social Media strategy and wrote new content for the Nexus Studios website.

I abseiled down The Crick Institute at Kings Cross London as a sponsored effort to raise money for Macmillan Cancer Relief after my Dad died of Prostate Cancer. I was Just Giving's highest single fund raiser that year.

contact.summary:
Ayesha is a Fusion-Tech Artist, Creative Director, and international Speaker who specializes in using frontier technologies such as AI / ML to challenge the traditional ideas of reality and human identity. As a researcher and strategy consultant for creative companies, she helps businesses manage innovative projects and navigate the rapidly evolving digital landscape to achieve impactful success.

With a strong belief in the power of innovation and interdisciplinary approach, Ayesha is committed to working to provide equal access to technology, innovative tools and education. Her work is driven by a passion for creating a better future through the use of technology, fashion and visual story-telling. She is known for her captivating presence and ability to demystify complex concepts of Simulation and Space Applications to create new startups,  3d printed wearable art exhibitions and immersive installations.

As the Founder of brand 'Ayesha M. Ali' , Ayesha is a strong advocate for gender equality in the fashion and tech space, and she believes that empowering women is crucial for the tech and innovation industry's success. Her dedication to diversity and inclusion makes her a sought-after host and speaker at events, where she shares her insights on how businesses can use frontier technologies, AI and research on space to accelerate businesses and create social impact at the same time. 
She is a space enthusiast and works with theme of space, light pollution, dark skies awareness in her self-directed projects that got her international recognition magazines, press and global conferences.
 Her most sought after areas of expertise are 3D Printing, sustainable fashion designs, Artificial Intelligence and Data Fusion techniques.

In her role as a Co-Founder of Metavisionaries and Advisory Board member at Metaverse Fashion Council, Ayesha leverages her expertise in digital transformation to help revolutionize the way people interact with digital content. Her work as a Fusion-Tech Artist has won her numerous accolades, and she continues to push the boundaries of what is possible with technology.

If you want to work on a project with me reach out on this email 

ayeshaali.ayesha@gmail.com

My social media handles, Portfolio and Featured Interviews are here:https://linktr.ee/ayesharayy

projects.description: Plutchik/Senti(m)ent project is an AI-driven interactive environment with designer bots, reacting to human presence and viewership and their complex and emergent emotional cues through a multitude of handmade outfits and sounds. Drawing ideas from psychologist Robert Plutchik’s perspectives on an evolutionary history of human emotions and their derivative and compound states, the project aims to underscore the complex and emergent nature of emotions and tries to locate how a carefully developed data set through research can help AI detect this emergent nature of human emotion as a sentient being. The research includes psychoacoustic association between sounds and human emotions locating the associations between emotional expressions and equivalent sounds, and data mining of emotional cues expressed on the World Wide Web, e.g. in social media platforms, in the form of emoticons, memes and other sharable images. The project develops an interactive fashion bot that can see (e.g. colours) and hear (e.g. ambient sounds) through the interaction ports: webcam and microphone using the data sets of images and sounds related to eight primary emotional cues Plutchik proposed: Fear, Anger, joy, Sadness, trust, disgust, anticipation, and surprise, and their complex derivatives. The sentient bot recognizes these compound emotional states by responding in the changes in outfits and sounds.

projects.title: Be Fantastic Fellow

projects.description: The way we see or interpret images can shape the way we understand other people, ultimately defining how we identify with ourselves. Self-projection into the perfect human forms like dolls and mannequins can induce in us the covetousness of an ideal. This ideal is imagined, familiar and yet could be an uncanny ‘other’. Unrecognizable ideals created in the subconscious of one’s mind, are reflected as a staged ‘curated self’, displaying all documentation as evidence over the web, for that particular event. Through this fictional personification of the ‘self’, performing digitally, I have tried to dissect the web of complex visibility patterns in relation to the ideas of simulation, to generate new dialogue regarding the narration of captured reality through the lens of the camera. Curated ‘self’, therefore becomes another way to live experiences you might not otherwise will, as a piece of ‘false’ evidence. These ‘simulated’ avatars retain themselves as a byproduct of global image rotation, collective cultural aesthetics, and western fashion trends. With myself as a subject under scrutiny, this project aims to highlight, propagate and exaggerate the bizarre eccentricity of daily encounters, from a position of a model/subject/woman but also through the lens of photographer, mirror, female, and spectacle. My practice, therefore, interrogates bizarreness and blurred boundaries between reality and illusions, collective memory and desires, genders, and set roles. I am interested in exploring costumes, drama, and the role of acted truth in the construction of how larger meaning is perceived by society. Costumes become a response towards observed/transforming culture but also an extension of the human body as a lab specimen. This specimen can be studied with new research methodologies in response to how cameras can catalogue, document and make it visible. A specimen that only exists / is visible for a larger spectacle.

profile_positions.description:
Introducing "Ayesha M. Ali" – a groundbreaking fusion of fashion, art, and sustainability that blurs the lines between digital and physical realms while redefining creative boundaries.

Amidst fast communication, information overload, and complex digital identities, through each piece we aim to navigate the emerging trends by making unseen and unimaginable visual narratives, visible.

 Our art and wearables leverage AI/ML to produce visionary designs that challenge the limits of creativity. We aim to revolutionize the way we interact with fashion that prioritizes environmental consciousness, to transcend product creation, ignite a movement, reimagining fashion and art possibilities in the face of technological advancements while embracing sustainability. 

Ayesha Mubarak Ali, the driving force behind Neolumi and Bio-Designs Collection, is a visionary fusion-tech artist who merges contemporary aesthetics with traditional, neon and glitches, with biology, space, anime, and pixels, to create a captivating visual vocabulary. Informed by her research on simulation and hyper-reality, Ayesha's approach reflects our rapidly evolving digital age and the growing demand for intelligent, conscious products.

Join us on this extraordinary journey into exclusive designs by Ayesha Mubarak Ali – where art, technology, imagination, and sustainability converge to create a world of innovation, beauty, and responsibility by promoting a more eco-conscious future. visit website ayeshamubarakali.com
profile_positions.title: Founder and Owner

profile_positions.description:
Metavisionaries is a community of changemakers, thought leaders and industry experts who are committed to providing access to the space economy and frontier technologies to build socially inclusive competency and human capacity required to meet immediate and future sustainability challenges.
We do this through our MetaEduVersity and space campus the Metaship which utilizes web3 and the metaverse combined with our physical SPACE INNOVATION LABS with our partners ICE Cubes. These labs will be strategically placed globally to ensure socially inclusive access to resources, tools and networks of industry experts to build purpose driven organizations focussed on solving sustainability challenges.

profile_positions.description:
A startup exploring the connection between effects of lights, sustainable fashion, digital design, and surveillance. 
A project executed from a perspective dark sky defender- Rayan Khan (Founder of Cosmic Tribe) and Ayesha M. Ali (Visual Artist) designed an interdisciplinary project that constitutes artistic expression, technology, material exploration to study/research the impact of artificial lights especially on the psychological health of the post-millennial generation. 
The ongoing project aimed to experiment and produce knowledge beyond human comprehensibility by fusing traditional and digital techniques to talk about abstract ideas of light and its unseen effects in our lives.

contact.summary:
Feel like your Amazon sales aren't skyrocketing like you thought they would be? Or worst, not earning a profit from the sales you are making?

Maybe you’ve worked with an Amazon PPC agency in the past and felt let down by them and felt like they didn’t really care or perhaps even understand your brand. And just didn’t get you the results you felt you could achieve?!

Hire me to lead your Amazon strategy and implementation plan.  You bring the first class product range and I’ll supercharge your sales and marketing and free up your time and resources to focus on other areas of the business 🚀

🔶🔷🔶🔷🔶

You can work with me in three ways:

1 - Amazon Brand/Account Management - I become your remote Director of Amazon and take responsibility for your Amazon store. This option is suitable for brands earning over £1million per year on Amazon and spending £10K per month+ on Amazon ads.

2 - Launch, Rank and Scale Packages 

3 - Amazon Advertising (PPC) 

Who I work with:

I specialise in working with businesses that are already on Amazon and earning at least 7 figures and want to increase their reach, revenue and profit goals! I work with clients across the UK & US.

However, if you’ve got a fantastic product range and a marketing budget to invest in building your brand on Amazon, I would be excited to learn more, so do not hesitate to get in touch!

What makes me different?

Rather than working with an agency, or trying to hire in-house, I am the more cost effective, performance driven solution for ambitious brands looking to scale on Amazon. 

You can think of me as your Director of Amazon - consultant, project manager, marketer & problem solver in one, but without the large overhead or HR commitments.

But I do not do this on my own. 

Over the years, I have formed strategic partnerships with world class experts from across the UK & US, and this means I can confidently curate the perfect project team, if required, for the clients I work with and get INCREDIBLE results!

▪️ Strategy, Data & Analytics
▪️ Amazon PPC
▪️ Amazon SEO
▪️ Listing Optimisation
▪️ Catalogue Management
▪️ Post-Purchase Marketing (CRM) 
▪️ Off-Amazon marketing 

For you, this means more traffic, higher conversion rates, and more profitable sales. At a lower cost than hiring in-house, or working with an agency. Guaranteed!

🔶🔷🔶🔷🔶

Although I would love to support everyone who wants to work with me, I pride myself on providing a truly boutique experience for my clients. Therefore, I only take on a limited number of brands at any given time.

contact.summary:
Your Branding is Boring, let me fix it!

Hi, I’m Saumya (tiny one with not-so-tiny dreams), currently the Co-Founder of Vedits.in (a video editing company) and LinkedIn Growth Hacker 📈

I am a digital marketer by profession and an entrepreneur from heart.

In my childhood, I always use to tell everyone that I am gonna be a super cool doctor in the future treating poor guys and helping them with free medicines, but destiny had other plans for me.

I have worked in the hospitality sector after completing my graduation from St. Xavier’s College, Ranchi. 

I put “UNSTOPPABLE” after my name because I believe in lifelong learning. 

However, I fell in love with marketing much later when I started discovering websites for myself in the year 2020. I, along with my buddy started working for startups, helping them with video editing and websites and whatever it is and was successful in growing it to lakhs in a month.

However, failures didn’t stop me from experimenting and trying new things.
So, in the year 2022, I wrote my first ever book on Freelancing (The Future of Freelancing)📖📕

I have been a marketing consultant to over 45 startups, helping them to find new customers & grow exponentially through growth hacking.

As a personal branding expert, I have a deep understanding of the importance of building and managing a strong personal brand. I have spent years studying the concepts of personal branding and have honed my skills in developing and promoting a strong personal brand for individuals and businesses. 

My expertise lies in helping clients define their personal brand, creating a strategic plan to promote it, and executing that plan through various marketing and communication channels. I also help clients manage their online reputation and ensure that their personal brand aligns with their professional goals.

If you want to talk more about freelancing hacks or Branding tips drop me a mail at - connect@gounstoppable.com or admin@mywebmonster.com 📩

volunteer_experiences.description: Youth Parliament Pakistan is a project launched in 2007 by the PILDAT to engage youth in Pakistan in healthy discourse and expose them to the democratic process and practices. Members of Youth Parliament Pakistan are selected for duration of a year at a time.

As a driven and passionate software engineer, I have always been dedicated to using my skills for the betterment of society. That's why I was honored to be selected for a three-month training program organized by United People Global, where I learned how to start new projects and tackle upcoming issues. This program allowed me to make friends and connect with people from all over the world, and it was an incredibly fun and rewarding experience

UNLEASH is an annual global innovation lab for the SDGs, where talents from around the world get together to develop innovative solutions for a better and more sustainable world. This 2022, UNLEASH will host a Global Innovation Lab in India and a Regional Innovation Lab in Greenland. The UNLEASH Regional Innovation Lab 2022 will happen in Nuuk (Greenland), between the 20th and 27th of August. The lab will gather 200 young talents (18-35 years) from the Arctic and Nordic countries to develop innovative solutions for some of the most challenging SDGs in the region.

As a Global Peace Ambassador, I am dedicated to promoting and advocating for peace in all aspects of my life. In 2022, I was honored to be selected to participate in the Global Peace Summit in Baku, Azerbaijan, where I had the opportunity to learn from and connect with like-minded individuals from around the world. This three-day event was an incredibly enriching and meaningful experience that helped me understand the importance of peace and the role we can all play in creating a more harmonious world. In my role as a Peace Ambassador, I am committed to continuing this work and doing my part to make a positive impact on the world

volunteer_experiences.description:
Réseau Entourage, with their LinkedOut programme, give excluded and isolated people the support networks they need to bounce back and allow them to regain their place in society.

As a supporter, I share CVs of LinkedOut candidates with my professional network on LinkedIn to help them find new opportunities.

The LIFT project is a project to prevent the risk of non-integration into the labour market at the end of compulsory school.
It is aimed at pupils who miss the right conditions to start their professional career.

As a supporter, I raise awareness about Lift activities with my professional network on LinkedIn to identify companies that could offer a position for 3, 6 or 9 months.

awards.description:
CrowdCrawler is the 1st aggregator & comparator of crowdfunding real estate deals, helping global investors make timely and informed investment decisions.
more info at www.crowdcrawler.co

What is FinTech Startup Weekend?
A 54-hour event for entrepreneurs, designers and developers to hack on their latest FinTech idea. Participants present their own concept and form a team around it or join forces with someone else. Over the weekend, they receive active coaching from industry experts and mentors to bring their ideas to life by putting the foundations of a business case, designing and building a product prototype, testing their assumptions with potential customers, and, on Sunday night, pitching the results of their weekend's work to a panel of investors and industry titans from across banking, insurance and payment industry.
awards.title: Winner of the FinTech Startup Weekend Zurich 2015 with CrowdCrawler

profile_positions.description:
Lead a team to manage the day-to-day activities for the organization property/facility and Develop and Create a strong culture by building and maintaining a high-performing team that is engaged, innovative, and deeply connected to the mission of supporting our customers. Establish and maintain a safety-first culture by promoting and driving safe work practices, timely training, and best practices. 
People Management 
•	Demonstrate and ensure to instill a culture in the team and values of being an Expert, Proactive, Innovative, Versatile, Team Player and valuing the Customer. 
Stakeholder Management
•	Build and develop effective stakeholder relationships across multiple levels of the organization and Partner with management and others to anticipate future business changes and challenges.
Procurement & Vendor Management
•	Ensure vendors are well-managed, delivering services on time and within budget and vendor procurement processes comply with agreed procurement guidelines as well as best practice
Contracts Management
•	Uphold contract terms and conditions with subcontractors and suppliers to ensure the proper delivery of goods and services against contracts and expectations
Finance Management
•	Assist in the development and ongoing management of detailed, zero-based operating budgets and Actively work to ensure that the organization's financial operations are meeting or exceeding targets and control requirements 
Operations Management
•	Support the business by developing and implementing standard operating procedures (SOPs) and preventive maintenance schedules (PM) to support all areas and Coordinate system repairs and monitoring systems to ensure maximum uptime and system performance.
Risk Management
•	Ensure a property risk management program including audits is implemented and maintained and Ensure disaster recovery and business continuity plans are implemented and maintained. Achieve Key Performance Indicators and Service Level Agreement targets.

profile_positions.description:

• Drive the strategy for effective planning and scheduling of critical maintenance to achieve timely completion of work and minimal disruption to business operations.

• Oversee RFP processes; negotiate and manage service contracts for several vendors and contractors

contact.summary:
If you are struggling to increase your online visibility, you might be wondering how other people do it?👇



📊' My online traffic increased both organically and using paid media in the last 40 days and I was able to demonstrate a high ROI and ROAS.' 
. George T.

📈'Organic traffic increased and our ROI rose by 10% in 3 months - more than first predicted.'
.Mark P.

🎯'My Business' KPIs were met and exceeded in the first quarter man. Thank you.'
Dave L.



Now you say, okay so what? 🗣️ But these people were in the exact position you may be in right now. 

You need to be heard and your brand needs to be seen. I am sure you have a lot of value to offer! 😎

If you are a sole business owner, self-employed, or a Solopreneur and:

⚠️You don't have enough or any visitors to your website or profile.

⚠️Don't convert the visitors that make it to your website.

⚠️You feel that your online effort is a waste of time.

⚠️You are fed up with all the different things you have to do to get people to your content and convert them into clients.


👀This is where I come in and implement a strategy that will pay off in no time! 🕰️ 


❇️ What I can do for you ❇️


✅Optimise your website and profile to attract your ideal audience.

✅Focus on content that brings visitors ready to engage with your offer.

✅Repurpose your content to be used on different platforms and capture that attention.

✅Implement strategies that will make your visitors stay more on your website and follow what you want them to do.

✅Make your brand stand out online.

In that way, you will be focusing on the day-to-day activities you enjoy while I make your brand stand out online!


📩 Message me here on Linkedin and let's craft a strategy that will work for you. I am happy to provide you with more info and answer any questions you may have.

🙌If you are still sceptical follow me as I bring out daily tips on how to surf the online sea.

If I can't help you out - I will consult you for free until you get the results you want! 🚀


Me behind the scenes:

Hey I am Lukas and I grew up in Greece where I studied History and Philosophy of Science - I know right?

I moved to England in 2019, got a Master's in Business Management, and been working in Digital Marketing since 2020.

My goal is to hack the online Matrix and make businesses stand out. That is why when I am not working I study, research, and take on courses - I have like 1,000 on my list.

But I also go to the gym daily, meet and talk to people, play football, and dance. 🕺 

Lukas out 🎤

If you are struggling to increase your online visibility, you might be wondering how other people do it?👇



📊' My online traffic increased both organically and using paid media in the last 40 days and I was able to demonstrate a high ROI and ROAS.' 
. George T.

📈'Organic traffic increased and our ROI rose by 10% in 3 months - more than first predicted.'
.Mark P.

🎯'My Business' KPIs were met and exceeded in the first quarter man. Thank you.'
Dave L.



Now you say, okay so what? 🗣️ But these people were in the exact position you may be in right now. 

You need to be heard and your brand needs to be seen. I am sure you have a lot of value to offer! 😎

If you are a sole business owner, self-employed, or a Solopreneur and:

⚠️You don't have enough or any visitors to your website or profile.

⚠️Don't convert the visitors that make it to your website.

⚠️You feel that your online effort is a waste of time.

⚠️You are fed up with all the different things you have to do to get people to your content and convert them into clients.


👀This is where I come in and implement a strategy that will pay off in no time! 🕰️ 


❇️ What I can do for you ❇️


✅Optimise your website and profile to attract your ideal audience.

✅Focus on content that brings visitors ready to engage with your offer.

✅Repurpose your content to be used on different platforms and capture that attention.

✅Implement strategies that will make your visitors stay more on your website and follow what you want them to do.

✅Make your brand stand out online.

In that way, you will be focusing on the day-to-day activities you enjoy while I make your brand stand out online!


📩 Message me here on Linkedin and let's craft a strategy that will work for you. I am happy to provide you with more info and answer any questions you may have.

🙌If you are still sceptical follow me as I bring out daily tips on how to surf the online sea.

If I can't help you out - I will consult you for free until you get the results you want! 🚀


Me behind the scenes:

Hey I am Lukas and I grew up in Greece where I studied History and Philosophy of Science - I know right?

I moved to England in 2019, got a Master's in Business Management, and been working in Digital Marketing since 2020.

My goal is to hack the online Matrix and make businesses stand out. That is why when I am not working I study, research, and take on courses - I have like 1,000 on my list.

But I also go to the gym daily, meet and talk to people, play football, and dance. 🕺 

Lukas out 🎤

projects.description: Sustainability has fast evolved in business practices, and yet its meaning is often elusive and ambiguous. The component of sustainability is playing an important role in the company’s brand positioning. The popularity and the importance of sustainability in business operations and business representation are still rapidly growing. The linkage of the branding and sustainability messaging has a strong correlation with the consumer’s perception. Moreover, the brand messaging construction with the right terminologies’ selection is one of the brand communication activities. However, the aspect of “sustainability manufacturing” caught great attention in recent years. Therefore, our study project is based on comprehending the authentic brand positioning with the right sustainability terminology usage aiming to deliver strong sustainability messaging. More precisely, the project's primary aim has been to investigate and explore the impact of sustainability terminology used by manufacturing companies in Sweden on consumer perception.

contributors.headline: Marketing Manager at PAteam

projects.title: The Impact of sustainability terminologies of Swedish manufacturing companies on consumer perception: A mono-method quantitative study

projects.description: Increasing uses of Social Media platforms have been able to draw the attention of businesses as a tool to communicate with their customers. As the growth continues, businesses are also aiming to adapt to the new functionalities of social media platforms for more customer engagement. The dark mode is one of the current emerging experiences in social media. An overwhelming number of social media users have started to use the dark mode. The popularity of the dark mode is primarily connected to two prime conditions: health benefits and well-being, considering the reduction of eyestrain issues and battery saving. Moreover, it is considered visually appealing and satisfying. The primary purpose of this degree project is to get a detailed understanding of the importance and the right usage of the dark mode with social media postings, particularly within the scope of digital marketing communication in business administration. This purpose has been accompanied by conducting a quantitative study where the 157 social media users shared their preferences and thoughts through an experimental questionnaire. The study aimed to determine, compare, and experiment with the social media postings based on dark and light modes to identify the valuable insights of visual attractiveness on Facebook from the user’s perception.

contributors.headline: Marketing Manager at PAteam

projects.title: The impact of dark mode on the visual attractiveness of social media postings: A users' perception study based on Facebook: A mono-method quantitative study

As the founder and career coach at Career Ownership Hub, I empower mid career professionals to build a complete career roadmap with clarity and confidence. I have over 15 years of experience in sales, marketing, and digitalization, working with global leaders like Siemens and Larsen & Toubro. I am also an MBA, a certified trainer, and an Amazon best-selling author.

My mission is to transform 500 lives in two years by helping professionals take charge of their journey and not just react to the circumstances. I use a proven framework of reflection, reinvention, strengthening, and sustaining to help them improve their public speaking, presentation, networking, and mindset skills. I also mentor and coach engineers and MBAs in interview preparation and personal branding. Join me at Career Ownership Hub and become a director of your life journey, not just a character.

profile_positions.description:
I lost my parents to a car accident when I was 11. Since then I have been running to prove myself to the world.
The race started with securing marks, good grades, then getting a job followed by the race for increments and promotions. 

Do you Agree?? If yes, join the Career Ownership Hub (www.puravbhatt.com)

I strongly believe that we (humans) have been programmed to behave in a particular way since childhood. 

This programming has led to a belief system and a set of habits.

A belief system that 
✅ limit our capabilities, 
✅ prevents us from taking risks
✅ instills fear and insecurity

due to a
✅fixed mindset with a sense of scarcity

The habit programming involve
✅competing with others
✅comparing

The biggest risk that we are taking is that we are passing this mindset to the next generations as well.
 
After almost a decade of corporate journey, I reflected on my journey and I realized that if I do not reprogram and reframe my mind, I'll keep running the race operating at a very low potential than actual.

I  started working on myself and since 2017, I have been investing time and money on my self development.

After working on myself for more than 4 years (the reprograming takes time), I quit my job and started the Career Ownership Hub with a mission to 

"empower a 100,000 midcareer professionals to take charge of their career by becoming a creator of circumstances and not a victim and that's why I have created a Career Architect Framework"

I have already mentored more than a 100 professionals in the last two years (while I was doing this part-time). 

I want all professionals to take complete ownership of their Professional and Personal Life.

With my mission, I have already started influencing journeys

profile_positions.description:
Author, Story Telling, Writing, Copywriting, Coaching, Mentoring

The world is undergoing a transformation. Unfortunately, the education system is not able to keep pace with this transformation and hence not preparing the students for a smooth transition from campus to corporate.
Majority of the students making a debut in the corporate world are completely unaware of what’s going on outside the four walls of their institute.
With the culture around, the students have been hard wired to believe that the only goal is to get a degree at the end of their journey through the campus.
There is an immediate need to think beyond formal education, degrees and certificates.
A huge mindset disruption is required not only for the students but also for the parents.
If you agree with the above, this is the book for you.
This is a must read for Parents with children nearing completion of school, pursuing higher education and for all students.
I also recommend this for people curious to find the practical methods to progress in their professional career.
With his experience of over 15 years in the corporate world, the author has explained simple but unconventional techniques to stay up to date with the disrupting economy.
His mission10million, aims to transform the campus to corporate journey of 10 million students. 
It is to make their journey faster, better, smoother, more fulfilling, and guide them to avoid a bump or two along the way.
The intention is to equip the students to gain more control over the next steps in their career with better clarity.
profile_positions.title: Amazon Best Seller - Amazing secrets for a transformational journey - Campus to Corporate and Beyond

profile_positions.description:
Established in January 2019, at mission10million we aspire to influence the campus to corporate journey of 10 million students. We want their journey to be better and faster. They should not commit the same mistakes that many of us committed in the transition from the campus to corporate. 
Help us to reach out to as many student as possible.

profile_positions.description:
I was Reverse - Mentoring CEOs in this role, 

The One Skill that helped me achieve success in this role is active Networking.

Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, Data Analytics, Remote Monitoring, Co-creations, Discovery Workshops, Creativity, Technical and Learning Agility, Innovation, Business Model Development

Driving digitalization for Oil & Gas Customers and Utilities across Asia, this has been a wonderful journey.

The technology is disrupting, customers are adapting and I get to explore new business opportunities.

This has offered me a great learning platform and an opportunity to blend the conventional business with new age digital technologies.

Since I took this responsibility, I have secured order entries worth 7 million Euros and all these wins were first of their kind globally.
   
My sales experience helped me work closely with country sales teams to develop Go-To-Market Strategy, evaluate market potential and derive business forecast

I participate and represent Siemens at various seminars / conferences on digital transformation to create awareness amongst customers.

With experience in Strategy I have developed new Business Models & Value Based Proposals for Digital Offerings

I support Product / Solution Development teams with customer feedback to develop customized solutions.
profile_positions.title: Lead - Sales & Business Development - Digital Solutions, Asia

profile_positions.description:
Leadership, Strategy, Collaboration, Business Development, Problem Solving, Data Mining, Communication,  Presentations

The one critical thing that I learned was "Leading Without a Title" while leading Strategy across all business units at my organization, a business of more than 100 million Euros in the Asia Pacific Region.
 
Formulating regional level business strategies for India & Bangladesh based on exhaustive study of Power Industry and Oil & Gas Sector in congruence with the Government Policies.

Lead Annual Budgeting, Market Model analysis & target fixing exercise

Lead management meetings. Collaborate with regional counterparts,  Global Head Quarters on various strategic topics

Monitor SalesForce.com quality for opportunity tracking.

Administering Corporate Communication topics for the division

Leading the Digital Service Portfolio. I created Digital Roadmap for the Division.

It was at this time when we took over the Rolls Royce and Dresser Rand businesses and I witnessed the complexities of integrating businesses.
 
This role helped me look at the bigger picture and always take into consideration external factors affecting any business. 

Working in the leadership team gave me a completely different perspective and with the networking that I did during this role helped me take the next step with a regional responsibility.

zFull.summary:
As the founder and career coach at Career Ownership Hub, I empower mid career professionals to build a complete career roadmap with clarity and confidence. I have over 15 years of experience in sales, marketing, and digitalization, working with global leaders like Siemens and Larsen & Toubro. I am also an MBA, a certified trainer, and an Amazon best-selling author.

My mission is to transform 500 lives in two years by helping professionals take charge of their journey and not just react to the circumstances. I use a proven framework of reflection, reinvention, strengthening, and sustaining to help them improve their public speaking, presentation, networking, and mindset skills. I also mentor and coach engineers and MBAs in interview preparation and personal branding. Join me at Career Ownership Hub and become a director of your life journey, not just a character.
