awards.title: Indian Achievers' Award

awards.description:
Leading the team to win a Footprint replacement order for a Mechanical Drive Turbine. An existing Dual casing turbine will be replaced by a single casing turbine on the same foundation. 
A very high level of cross functional, cross divisional and cross regional synergies were exhibited to win the first of its kind order for Mechanical Drive Turbine for Siemens India.
awards.title: Merit reward for securing first Steam Turbine footprint replacement order of a Mechanical Drive Turbine. This was first of its kind for new unit division as well which gave Siemens an entry into mechanical drive market.

awards.description:
The Siemens Potential Development program was designed for the Top Performers from across Siemens India. This was a two year program where 27 of us from various divisions worked on Business Impact Projects with innovative ideas for business growth.

In a team of 6, we executed a project for effective Cross Divisional Collaboration and Field Force utilization. Secured the first runners-up award out of 8 projects amongst the Group

I got an opportunity to be at IIM Bangalore for a Executive MBA program (Duration 3 Months) designed for Siemens during this Program.
awards.title: Part of the Siemens Potential Development Program

awards.description:
We secured a very critical order where we are supposed to revamp the turbine to restore the efficiency to designed parameters after 3 years of operation.
The efficiency levels went down drastically due to bad stem quality. 
Siemens had very high stakes as the customer has Siemens installations across their other plants as well.
awards.title: Synergy Award for Successful execution of a Steam Turbine Modification Order

awards.description: I was actively involved in the execution of the Footprint replacement order. The order execution required for a very close coordination across functions and across divisions. As this was the first of its kind order, we established various processes during the execution for future such orders.
awards.title: Synergy Award for the Successful Execution of the First Steam Turbine Footprint Replacement Order

awards.description:
Due to change in the process steam requirements, the customer was utilizing live steam via PRDS for the process. The same boiler was also supplying steam to a condensing turbine. 
Siemens offered a Back Pressure Turbine on the same foundation with the same power output and met the process steam requirements.
With the advanced turbine technology, Siemens helped the customer improve the heat rate resulting in fuel savings.
The project ROI was less than a year.
awards.title: Merit reward for securing the first Steam Turbine Footprint replacement Order for Siemens India. For the first time in history, we replaced a competitor’s Turbine

contact.titleDescription:
Who do I help?

IT professionals with 10+ years of experience who are feeling undervalued, unfulfilled or insecure.

You want to overcome one or more of these challenges:
① You've hit your income ceiling
② You get ignored for promotion
③ You do not feel respected at work
④ You're in the same job for many years
⑤ You're performing roles below your capability
⑥ You're in same role for long despite changing jobs
⑦ You get good, but not outstanding performance review
⑧ You are finding it challenging to perform in your new role  
⑨ You don't feel inspired by your work, you do it just to pay bills

Book a 15 mins call with me at https://calendly.com/coach-ehsan
contact.name: Ehsan Ali  🚀
contact.occupation: Career Coach || Helping Indian IT professionals worldwide break free from mid-career stagnation || Learn the proven strategies - Register for the FREE workshop⤵|| Ex- IT Sales & Delivery Leader || 🏋️Certified PT

contact.reactor_title: Certified Master Career Coach🔷I help Indian IT professionals living abroad overcome mid-career blues (Stagnation, Lost Confidence & Lack of Direction) & become unstoppable | 20 yrs mentorship experience
contact.summary:
Typical Breakthroughs My Coachees Create:

📌 A Snr. Support Analyst became Director in a Big4 - an unbelievable 3-level jump in just 7 months.   Became a thought leader across Asia & Australia in her niche within 12 months

📌 Amidst massive layoffs in the US, a DevOps Manager secured a Head of Platform position within 3 months

📌 "Without a job opening", a Data Analytics Lead secured a Strategic Role in a top TELCO 


If you are an IT professional, stuck in your mid/senior career, it could be due to 
-  lack of CONFIDENCE, MOTIVATION or a PROVEN STRATEGY.

Also, being good at your job and working hard is not enough to grow beyond certain level.

It took me 22 years to realise this truth. 

Although I excelled in my career, limited growth opportunities left me unsatisfied. So, I took a bold step – quitting my job to start on my own.

But I faced the same challenge again – no guidance from those who had walked the path before.

That's when the phrase "Your Network Is Your Networth" truly hit home.

To build a stronger network, I launched a groundbreaking podcast, connecting with top professionals who had achieved uncommon success.

Everything changed from that point on...

My network rapidly expanded, introducing me to exceptional role models and mentors. Their stories and strategies became my invaluable resource, reshaping my beliefs about what's possible.

I witnessed professionals reach CXO level within just 4 years of arriving in Australia, and some getting million-dollar salary! 

These individuals, just like you & me, proved that extraordinary success was within reach.

I was now excited to put their strategies to test.

The early wins came as I implemented these strategies with my existing mentees:

📌 A BA became Lead Architect
📌 A PM became Sales Director

Inspired, I launched my career coaching business, facilitating a number of breakthroughs

📌Snr. Support Analyst to Director in Big 4 in 7 months
📌Recognised at Asia level within 12 months
📌A DevOps Manager secured a Head of Platform role midst massive layoff in US
📌A Snr Automation Engineer got 45% hike and 2-level growth in 10 weeks 
📌 "Without a job opening", a Data Analytics Lead secured a Strategic Role in a top TELCO 

Many others created similar breakthroughs. 

Using my proven yet simple 3C framework, you too can get UNSTUCK in 12 weeks and rise to the Top 1% in under 18 months.

📌
Book a FREE 15-minute discovery call to discuss your unique situation and get my expert advice and personalised strategy (FREE for a limited time)

 🔗Link: calendly.com/coach-ehsan

The Australian Indian Business Network is a not-for-profit community run group based in Sydney and Melbourne. Our purpose is to create more trust, collaboration and mentorship between the Indian diaspora in Australia through business networking events and unique conversations.
Your voice is important, your actions are important and your community is important. Let's connect across borders through an online networking event hosted by the amazing volunteers who run this group.

contact.summary:
There are only two ways of getting paying customers:

1. You reach out to them.
2. Get them to reach out to You.

Most businesses fall in the first category.

Even if you're very good at what you do or your product is the best, your prospects are NOT CONFIDENT in your brand.

Heck, they even have no idea who you are, or what you bring to the table.

Your Marketing Strategy is WEAK.

As a result, you're wasting thousands of dollars on random marketing campaigns, or sending tons of cold messages just to convert a single lead, and are constantly worrying about where the next client will come from.

On top of that, you're probably struggling to communicate the REAL VALUE of your offer.

"What goes on my website? How do I stand out? What should I post? Where?"


Now, imagine your Brand being in front of the eyes of all the right people on all the right social media platforms.

Sales happens, but it doesn't feel like selling at all, it's more of a casual chat.

Clients are reaching out to YOU on a daily basis, and your only worry is how to support ALL THAT DEMAND.

You're in a position of POWER.


"𝗕𝘂𝘁 𝗵𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗵𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝗮𝗺 𝗜 𝗴𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼 𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗴𝗲?", I hear you asking.

This is where I jump in.


As a Performance Marketer, I work with entrepreneurs like you to transform the way you see your business by putting results-driven ad campaigns at the centre of it.

And for that, I get to the core of your business in order to understand, redefine, and address the challenges you face, and seamlessly provide the strategic clarity and creative direction needed to overcome them.  

My name is Yusha and I am a freelance performance marketer who specialises in Demand Generation through Facebook and Instagram ads.

In the last 5 years, I've scaled more than 75 businesses to a combined revenue of over 50M.

Want to work with me? 

DM for a free consultation call or reach me at yushaulhasan@gmail.com

Speak soon!

contact.reactor_title: Working with men in their 40s and 50s who want to reject middle-age aches, pains, stiffness and mediocrity and get more from life, today and in the decades ahead
contact.summary:
You’ve EARNED everything in your life.

Building a business, financial and asset wealth.

An overachiever.

You set your mind on something and get it done.

Taking pride in yourself as a leader and a role model.

Giving your family everything, they could want and need.

But are you, REALLY?

This “success” all comes at a cost.

And that cost is to all corners of your health.

Especially your body.

Even though you train regularly…

…you think you’re fit for a guy your age, only by looking around and comparing yourself to your age peers and think you’re ok as you are.

And though you train hard, what once worked in your 20s and 30s no longer does.

Smashing it and going harder doesn’t work.

More doesn’t work.

The alpha still trying to prove something.

The middle-aged dadbod has set in.

Your body has gone south.

Every year you’re looking softer, becoming slower, weaker with more aches and are more injury prone.

It’s the one area in your life where success eludes you.

You want more.

You’re hungry for the ultimate status symbol in middle age and beyond.

A legitimately fit, strong and lean body, brimming with health.

Health, physical capability and vitality are wealth.

It can only be EARNED!

This type of status is RARE in today’s world amongst men in their 40s and 50s.

It can’t be bought, done in a deal, or achieved on a whim. There are no shortcuts.

It’s the ultimate investment.

It’s something that no Breitling watch, high-end car, nip, tuck or filler can give you.

There's no higher level of success, self-respect, credibility, or self-worth than that gained from developing a fit, athletic and healthy body!

You know it takes effort.

And commitment.

Become the leader who builds a body full of strength, and vitality to ensure that your nearest and dearest can still rely on you when they need you and show them that you lead by example, now in in the future.
 
This is about real outcomes, making REAL improvements to how your body performs and moves, and carrying you well into your twilight years (looking good naked and feeling like a million dollars are by-products).
 
You must…
 
✅ Be willing to commit to a developmental training plan.
✅ Be experienced in exercise and training (this is not for beginners!).
✅ Be serious about investing time into reaching your goals.
✅ Be committed to meeting your own high standards.
✅ Embrace that knowledge and results require work and consistency.
 
Join the top 1% of men in terms of physical fitness, capability, and performance and become a beast among men...
 
...DM me and we'll talk.

profile_positions.description:
If you're a guy aged 40+, you’ve probably noticed ageing affecting your ability to get stronger, leaner, more muscular and stay healthy! Chances are you’ve also realised that the training methods you’ve used for the last decade or so, no longer work as well.

Overwhelmingly, guys over 40 struggle with training as a result of (1 or more) of these 3 reasons.

1. Chase a feeling – endorphins, pump, or weight; getting caught up in instant gratification you get from smashing a workout.

2. No structured long-term approach,  which leaves you spinning your wheels as time goes by. You hate stagnation as you thrive on progress.

3. You lost sight of your bigger goal, drifting on to what you enjoy as opposed to what you ACTUALLY need to get you back to progressing.

You are more prone to injuries that now hold you back and have niggles that built up over time. If you carry on down this path it’ll just lead to frustration, stagnation, and even more injuries.

Why?

Because simply training harder is best left to the young guys) and won’t cut it when you get past 40!

The good news is this can be fixed.

And, when you do fix it, you’ll look and perform better than other guys your age giving you more confidence, be the highly active dad and lead by example.

No matter your existing ability I WILL make you stronger, more muscular, leaner, and healthier WITHOUT increasing your risk of overtraining, risk of injury or spending hours in the gym.

Work with me and you'll get a clear, actionable plan you need to make a substantial difference to the quality of your training and nutritional habits.

Sound good?

Before you DM me, a few things:

1) I’ll listen to what you want and give you what you need BUT, you have to do the work.

2) I take what I do very seriously and expect you to as well.

3) You will have to train 3-5 times a week, for around an hour over 12 weeks.

So, IF you want to become an ageless athlete…

...DM and we'll talk.

zFull.summary:
You’ve EARNED everything in your life.

Building a business, financial and asset wealth.

An overachiever.

You set your mind on something and get it done.

Taking pride in yourself as a leader and a role model.

Giving your family everything, they could want and need.

But are you, REALLY?

This “success” all comes at a cost.

And that cost is to all corners of your health.

Especially your body.

Even though you train regularly…

…you think you’re fit for a guy your age, only by looking around and comparing yourself to your age peers and think you’re ok as you are.

And though you train hard, what once worked in your 20s and 30s no longer does.

Smashing it and going harder doesn’t work.

More doesn’t work.

The alpha still trying to prove something.

The middle-aged dadbod has set in.

Your body has gone south.

Every year you’re looking softer, becoming slower, weaker with more aches and are more injury prone.

It’s the one area in your life where success eludes you.

You want more.

You’re hungry for the ultimate status symbol in middle age and beyond.

A legitimately fit, strong and lean body, brimming with health.

Health, physical capability and vitality are wealth.

It can only be EARNED!

This type of status is RARE in today’s world amongst men in their 40s and 50s.

It can’t be bought, done in a deal, or achieved on a whim. There are no shortcuts.

It’s the ultimate investment.

It’s something that no Breitling watch, high-end car, nip, tuck or filler can give you.

There's no higher level of success, self-respect, credibility, or self-worth than that gained from developing a fit, athletic and healthy body!

You know it takes effort.

And commitment.

Become the leader who builds a body full of strength, and vitality to ensure that your nearest and dearest can still rely on you when they need you and show them that you lead by example, now in in the future.
 
This is about real outcomes, making REAL improvements to how your body performs and moves, and carrying you well into your twilight years (looking good naked and feeling like a million dollars are by-products).
 
You must…
 
✅ Be willing to commit to a developmental training plan.
✅ Be experienced in exercise and training (this is not for beginners!).
✅ Be serious about investing time into reaching your goals.
✅ Be committed to meeting your own high standards.
✅ Embrace that knowledge and results require work and consistency.
 
Join the top 1% of men in terms of physical fitness, capability, and performance and become a beast among men...
 
...DM me and we'll talk.
zFull.sub_title: Guys, Your Body Was Built To Last Way Beyond Middle Age, But You've Got To Treat It Right. The Great News Is, It's Never Too Late To Start. I'll Show You How.

contact.name: Naimeesha Murthy
contact.summary:
As a product leader with over a decade of experience, I am passionate about creating digital products that make a positive impact on the business and its customers. I believe in a data-driven and continuous experimentation approach to product development, and have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to success. 

My work has been featured in major media outlets such as Forbes, Builtin, and an Amazon best-selling book. I am also the founder of Products by Women, a community-led network for women in tech and business. I enjoy mentoring, advising, and investing in early-stage women-owned ventures and being a speaker and an advisory board member at various universities and organizations. I am currently leading strategic new product development initiatives at a top independent broker-dealer and RIA custodian in the US. 

I am always open to new opportunities and would love to connect with you, so please don't hesitate to reach out, I would love to hear from you, feel free to book time with me: https://topmate.io/naimeesha

____
Skills: Product Management, Product Development, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Product Marketing, Analytical Skills, Scrum, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Agile Methodologies, Business Analysis, Engineering, Program Management, Software Development, Analytics, User Experience (UX), Cloud Computing, Data Analysis, Process Improvement, E-Commerce, and Competitive Analysis are all essential skills for product managers.

treasury_media.description: Community-led product development pertains to the go-to-market strategy that focuses on the community of consumers who support the product and the company that produces it as a tool for customer acquisition. It relies on the community’s inputs for the growth of the product and the company. It gives value on relationship-building with the consumers and aims for brand loyalty and ultimately, increased revenue.
treasury_media.title: Why community-led product development is the new Go-to-market

treasury_media.description: Early in her career, Naimeesha was a product marketing expert, but after a while, she made the decision to switch to product management. She began networking and starting to build a support system for herself in a new industry, and it didn't take long before she realized just how big of a challenge she faced. It became starkly clear that mentorship for mid-level women in technology was not a priority for most organizations. As a woman and a new mom, Naimeesha had a new set of challenges ahead of her; she was juggling more than ever and working to become a go-to expert in product management. Once Naimeesha forged her path into product management, she vowed to change the landscape for women who came after her.
treasury_media.title: The Tech World Needs More Women In Leadership; Naimeesha Murthy Is Committed To Making It Happen
Naimeesha Murthy Leads By Example: Product Manager, Mentor, Founder and Angel Investor Bringing the Importance of Inclusivity Into The Spotlight

profile_positions.description:
Exodus 360 is a digital marketing agency focused on social media marketing, website design, and SEO, with a specialized focus on e-commerce. It's vital for brands to communicate a consistent message across their website, social media, and ad channels in order to create awareness and drive conversion. We work with businesses just like yours to create a cohesive digital strategy, and delight customers with incredible creative work. With over a decade of experience in digital marketing, Exodus 360 can help you reach your goals.

Exodus 360 collaborates with clients to:
- Design highly branded websites that convert traffic into leads and sales
- Drive new customer traffic to their website through social media channels, SEO, and PPC campaigns
- Understand best practices in communicating and merchandising their products and services
- Produce stunning photography and design that demonstrates quality to customers.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Results-driven Senior Paid Social Media Strategist with a proven track record in managing major Media Buying and Social Media Projects for E-Commerce brands. 

🔍 As a meticulous strategist, I possess an in-depth understanding of the ever-evolving landscape of paid social media advertising. Leveraging my comprehensive knowledge, I design and execute high-performing campaigns that generate increased brand awareness, engagement, and conversions. My proficiency spans across various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and more.

💡 Innovative and data-driven, I prioritize a holistic approach to campaign management. By conducting thorough audience research, I uncover valuable insights that inform targeting strategies, messaging, and creative development. My analytical mindset empowers me to continuously optimize campaigns, ensuring maximum return on ad spend (ROAS) and driving cost-efficient customer acquisition.

🚀 Throughout my career, I have successfully managed sizable media budgets, allowing me to efficiently allocate resources and optimize media buying strategies. By conducting thorough competitive analysis and staying abreast of industry trends, I seize opportunities for growth and stay ahead of the curve. I am adept at leveraging performance analytics and key metrics to provide insightful reports and recommendations to clients and stakeholders.

🌟 Collaborative and proactive, I thrive in cross-functional teams and foster strong relationships with clients and internal stakeholders. My excellent communication skills enable me to effectively convey complex strategies and ideas, aligning all parties towards a shared vision. I enjoy mentoring and leading junior team members, fostering their growth and development.

🔑 Key Skills: Paid Social Media Strategy, Media Buying, Campaign Management, Audience Research, Analytics and Reporting, Budget Allocation, Conversion Optimization, Brand Awareness, Engagement, E-Commerce, Team Leadership.

contact.summary:
A Digital Marketing Specialist, taking care of Social Media, Content Management, and Search Engine Optimization, and also helping with Brand building, Partnerships, and Growth Marketing.

When I was 21, I ran my first Full Marathon (41.2 Kms). Not metaphorically—I literally covered my first and longest run in my life.

While I was running, I thought about quitting approximately 5,000 times. (And that’s a lowball estimate.) But despite the high-density sunlight, less practice, mental and physical fatigue, and healthy snacks overdose, I kept going. I’m that person. Once I say I’ll do something, it will happen.

Now, I put that perseverance to work as a Digital Marketer for various clients and also being efficient enough to get into the skin of Digital Marketing Training Programs simultaneously. I don’t have to climb any mountains…but I do have to move them as a Growth Hacker.

A Digital Marketer with experience in corporate, start-ups, and freelancing environments. 

Manage digital marketing campaigns as a digital marketing specialist, in relation to Social Media, Search Engine Optimization, Content Marketing, Webinar Marketing, and E-Mail Marketing

I’m well-versed with various Digital Marketing Training Programs & Development and Digital Strategies.

If you’re interested in grabbing a cup coffee and talking, please send an email my way at jyotiswaroop.mohanty23@gmail.com

Being a part of Marketing Core Team, this position had an ample amount of opportunities to prove just like below 👨‍💻

➢	Create Marketing Plans geared toward end-users for each key product within the portfolio, in line with strategy and targets and within budget.
➢	Work with the In-House Designer to produce materials of visual impact and within brand guidelines.
➢	Work with the Business Innovations Department to develop new ideas for reaching end-user markets using the latest in electronic technologies.
➢	Communicate to the rest of the marketing team about new innovations and how they can be used to leverage marketing efforts.
➢	Preparation & Delivery of Marketing Plan within key objectives.
➢	Events Planning, Organization, and Execution.
➢	Copywriting of Articles, Marketing Materials, etc.
➢	Liaison with Media and Publishers as required.
➢	Supporting the Content Development and Navigation Architecture of the Website.
➢     Work with In-House Designer to produce materials of visual impact and within brand guidelines.
➢	Implementing SEO tasks such as keyword analysis, SEO technical audit, on-page optimization.
➢	Keeping abreast of progress in the digital marketing world and sharing research within the team.
➢	Working with the SEO team to provide innovative and industry-leading solutions to clients including SEO audits, Keyword Research, Content Strategy development, and link building strategy development.
➢	Work with the development team to ensure SEO best practices and recommendations are properly implemented.
➢	Compile and present SEO performance reports.
➢	Use E-Mail and other Electronic Marketing Techniques to inform customers of new products and generate sales.
➢	Measure the effectiveness of Marketing, Advertising, and Communications Programs and Strategies.
➢	Perform Market Research to assess the viability of potential new products and to measure the success of recent campaigns.

zFull.summary:
A Digital Marketing Specialist, taking care of Social Media, Content Management, and Search Engine Optimization, and also helping with Brand building, Partnerships, and Growth Marketing.

When I was 21, I ran my first Full Marathon (41.2 Kms). Not metaphorically—I literally covered my first and longest run in my life.

While I was running, I thought about quitting approximately 5,000 times. (And that’s a lowball estimate.) But despite the high-density sunlight, less practice, mental and physical fatigue, and healthy snacks overdose, I kept going. I’m that person. Once I say I’ll do something, it will happen.

Now, I put that perseverance to work as a Digital Marketer for various clients and also being efficient enough to get into the skin of Digital Marketing Training Programs simultaneously. I don’t have to climb any mountains…but I do have to move them as a Growth Hacker.

A Digital Marketer with experience in corporate, start-ups, and freelancing environments. 

Manage digital marketing campaigns as a digital marketing specialist, in relation to Social Media, Search Engine Optimization, Content Marketing, Webinar Marketing, and E-Mail Marketing

I’m well-versed with various Digital Marketing Training Programs & Development and Digital Strategies.

If you’re interested in grabbing a cup coffee and talking, please send an email my way at jyotiswaroop.mohanty23@gmail.com
zFull.sub_title: Head of Marketing and Growth : Digital Marketer & Trainer : Growth Hacker : Online Webinar Training : Speaker : Digital Marketing Specialist

contact.summary:
Innovative Data Analyst with 6+ months of experience in analyzing data and extracting profitable + insightful stories from it. 

I can help companies unlock hidden patterns, reveal valuable trends, and uncover critical business insights that drive informed decision-making.

Key Insights from my practice projects:
• Achieved valuable insights by leveraging Excel features to analyze over 30,000 rows of data which allowed me to identify and track a total of 31,047 orders, leading to a significant contribution of ₹21.07 million in sales.

• Examined a customer churn rate of 30.7% and analyzed the transition from free trial to an annual plan, finding an average duration of 105 days by analyzing a database of 1000 customers using SQL queries resulting in improvement in customer retention and increase in revenue growth.
